definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: But too much dreaming sinks and drowns.
sentences.chinese: 但过分的梦想能使人灭顶下沉。

sentences.english: Hundreds of thousands of ethnic Greeks were uprooted from Ionian coastal areas.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的种族希腊人在爱奥尼亚海岸遭到灭顶之灾。

sentences.english: De Lesseps failed spectacularly. It was a complete disaster.
sentences.chinese: 他经历了惨痛的失败，这是一场灭顶之灾。

sentences.english: How can they suffer complete annihilation of Lei Feng, the couple were the pain.
sentences.chinese: 又哪有雷锋灭顶之苦，夫妻分别之痛。

sentences.english: A remote village in Kaohsiung was feared fully sudmerged by flood-created lake burst.
sentences.chinese: 高雄县甲仙乡小林村甚至有恐全村惨遭灭顶。

sentences.english: Faith is our destroyer. Faith has brought us doom.
sentences.chinese: 信仰是我们的掘墓人，带来灭顶之灾。

definition: to capsize/to collapse/to overturn/to overthrow/to undermine
variant of 厄運|厄运[e4 yun4]
(of a watercourse) to breach its dike/(of dikes) to collapse
to overturn (a vehicle)/to capsize/to turn upside down/to change completely
